isis.stitle: Side Mount Cooling Package - RE Bus - DESCRIPTION - Hydraulic System

svcprocinfo.para: The RE bus utilizes a hydraulic system to drive the radiator fan and cool the radiator and charge air cooler. The hydraulic system responds to cooling requirements by monitoring engine temperatures. The hydraulic system consists of the following components: hydraulic pump, hydraulic reservoir, hydraulic fan drive motor, and hydraulic oil cooler.

svcsubproc.title: Hydraulic Reservoir and Filter
svcsubproc.para: The hydraulic reservoir provides a supply of clean, air-free oil to the hydraulic system. The hydraulic reservoir is vented and uses a two-site glass system for monitoring the oil level. The hydraulic reservoir is located to the right of the engine and can be accessed through the rear compartment service door.
The hydraulic reservoir has an internal filter that filters return oil flow and can easily be replaced from the top of the hydraulic reservoir.

svcsubproc.title: Hydraulic Pump
svcsubproc.para: The hydraulic pump provides oil flow for the hydraulic fan drive system and the power steering circuit. The hydraulic pump is mounted to the left side of the engine and can be accessed through the left-side rear compartment service door.

svcsubproc.title: Hydraulic Fan Drive Motor
svcsubproc.para: The hydraulic fan drive motor drives the radiator fan to cool the charge air cooler and engine coolant. Hydraulic oil is supplied to the hydraulic fan drive motor by the hydraulic pump.

svcsubproc.title: Hydraulic Oil Cooler
svcsubproc.para: The hydraulic system is protected by a hydraulic oil cooler to keep the hydraulic oil cool. The two-part hydraulic oil cooler allows the hydraulic oil to flow through the center of the hydraulic oil cooler while engine coolant flows through the outside of the hydraulic oil cooler. This process allows the engine coolant to cool the hydraulic oil.
The hydraulic oil cooler is mounted to a crossmember behind the rear bumper and can be accessed through the rear compartment service door.
